Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a model for the board game Carcassonne.
    Author:
    Ben Visness

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Model.Turn
      An enum to describe whose turn it is.

      Constructs a new Model with a given size.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model(int size)
        Constructs a new Model with a given size.
        Parameters:
        size - The width and height of the game board. This number must be odd so the board has a middle space.

                    int y)
        Gets the Tile at a given x and y on the game board.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-value of the tile to get.
        y - The y-value of the tile to get.
        Returns:
        The Tile at the given x and y.

      • getWinner

        public Model.Turn getWinner()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the winner of the game.
        Returns:
        The winner of the game, or null if the game is a draw.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the game is not yet over.
        See Also:
        Model.Turn

      • isMoveValid

        public boolean isMoveValid(int x,
                           int y,
                           Tile tile)
        Checks whether a given Tile can be legally placed at a given x and y on the board.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate at which to place the tile.
        y - The y-coordinate at which to place the tile.
        tile - The tile to place at the given x and y.
        Returns:
        Whether the Tile can be legally placed at the given x and y.

      • placeTile

        public void placeTile(int x,
                      int y,
                      Tile tile)
        Places the given tile at the given x and y on the board.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate at which to place the tile.
        y - The y-coordinate at which to place the tile.
        tile - The tile to place at the given x and y.

      • randomLegalTile

        public Tile randomLegalTile()
        Gets a random tile that can be legally placed on the board.
        Returns:
        A random legal tile.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the model. Very limited, only for emergency debugging purposes.
